# Aetherlink - Home Wireless Network Monitor

This is a web-based dashboard for monitoring home wireless networks with device details, trends, and live status.

## Project Stack

- Nuxt 3 with Vue 3
- TypeScript
- Vue 3 Composition API
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Chart.js/Vue-chartjs for data visualization
- Real-time updates for network monitoring

## Development Guidelines

- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow Vue 3 best practices
- Use Composition API with `<script setup>`
- Keep components modular and reusable
- API routes in `server/api/` directory
- Use auto-imports for components and composables
